name: 李政哲
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
schedule:
2nd semester:
w1: Infinite series: sequence + series(I)
w2: Infinite series: series(II)
w3: Infinite series: special series
w4: Vectors: dot product and cross product
w5: Geometry in space: lines, planes and surfaces
w6: Vector-Valued Functions: introduction and its calculus
w7: Functions of several variables: definition + limits + continuity
w8: Functions of several variables: partial derivatives + tangent plane
w9: Midterm
w10: Functions of several variables: skills for partial differentiations(I)
w11: Functions of several variables: skills for partial differentiations(II)
w12: Multiple integrals: double integrals(I)
w13: Multiple integrals: double integrals(II)
w14: Multiple integrals: triple integrals(I)
w15: Multiple integrals: triple integrals(II)
w16: Multiple integrals: triple integrals(III)
w17: Review
w18: Final

e.期末考:30%
